sourcesContent:
<template>
<Navbar 
:pages="pages"
:active-page="activePage"
:nav-link-click="(index)=> activePage=index"
>
  
</Navbar>
<pageViewer
:page="pages[activePage]"
>
  
</pageViewer>
</template>
<script>

import pageViewer from './components/pageViewer.vue';
import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
export default{
    components: {
        pageViewer,
        Navbar
    },
    data(){
        return{
            activePage: 0,
            pages: []
        };
    },
    beforeCreate(){
        this.getPages(); 
    },
    created(){
      this.getPages();  
    },
    methods:{
        async getPages(){
            let res=await fetch('pages.json');
            let data=await res.json();
            this.pages=data;
        }
    }
}
</script>
